description: Episode no. 3 of Series "Conditioning for Sport" Describes many specific exercises and training and condition techniques necessary for those interested in weight training. Weight training is a proven method for athletes to develop strength, power and muscular endurance, so it differs from weight lifting which emphasises strength and firm body building.
